title: Mayra Dias
text:
Mayra Benita Alves Dias (born 28 September 1991) is a Brazilian model and beauty pageant titleholder. She was crowned <a href="Miss%20Brasil%202018">Miss Brasil 2018</a> on 26 May 2018, becoming the second representative from <a href="Amazonas%20%28Brazilian%20state%29">Amazonas</a>. She represented <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a> at the <a href="Miss%20Universe%202018">Miss Universe 2018</a>.
Early life.
Dias was born in <a href="Itacoatiara%2C%20Amazonas">Itacoatiara</a>, a city in the interior of the state of <a href="Amazonas%20%28Brazilian%20state%29">Amazonas</a>. She is of <a href="Europe">Europe</a>an and <a href="Native%20Brazilian">Native Brazilian</a> descent.
Career.
Miss Mundo Amazonas 2015.
Dias was crowned Miss Mundo Amazonas 2015 and competed at the Miss Mundo Brasil 2015 in <a href="Florian%C3%B3polis">Florianópolis</a>.
Miss Mundo Brasil 2015.
Dias will represent Amazonas at the <a href="Miss%20Brazil%20World">Miss Mundo Brasil 2015</a> at the Teatro Governador Pedro Ivo in <a href="Florian%C3%B3polis">Florianópolis</a> in the state of <a href="Santa%20Catarina%20%28state%29">Santa Catarina</a> but she placed in the Top 20 semifinalist.
Reina Hispanoamericana 2016.
Dias was joined and chosen as Brazilian Representative at Reina Hispanoamericana 2016 at the FexpoCruz, <a href="Santa%20Cruz%2C%20Bolivia">Santa Cruz, Bolivia</a> on 5 November 2016 defeating 22 other beauties competing for the title where she ended as the 1st Runner-Up. However, despite being in her home country and in her hometown, it was Camila Soleibe from <a href="Colombia">Colombia</a> who eventually won the title Reina Hispanoamericana 2016.
Miss Brasil 2018.
Dias representing Amazonas was crowned <a href="Miss%20Brasil%202018">Miss Brasil 2018</a> held at the <a href="Riocentro">Riocentro</a> in <a href="Rio%20de%20Janeiro">Rio de Janeiro</a> its grand finale on 26 May 2018 where 27 beautiful divas competed for the national title. She succeeded outgoing Miss Brasil 2017 <a href="Monalysa%20Alc%C3%A2ntara">Monalysa Alcântara</a>.
Miss Universe 2018.
Dias represented <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a> at the <a href="Miss%20Universe%202018">Miss Universe 2018</a> pageant in <a href="Bangkok">Bangkok</a>, <a href="Thailand">Thailand</a>, where she placed in the top 20.
